titleStmt.title: Sermons of the ryght famous a[n]d excellent clerke Master Bernardine Ochine, borne within the famous vniversyte of Siena in Italy, nowe also an exyle in this life, for the faythfull testimony of Jesus Christ
titleStmt.author: Ochino, Bernardino, 1487-1564.
Argentine, Richard, d. 1568.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Anthony Scoloker. Dwellyng in. S. Nycholas Parryshe,

notesStmt.note: At foot of title page: Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
Six sermons, translated by Richard Argentine.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
